message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a one-time offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,000,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $800,000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a concession to make this deal happen.
